description.p: The assigned_document_select specifies a Document, Document_version, Document_definition or a File which may be associated with product data.
The documented_element_select specifies an extensible select of elements to which documents can be assigned.
A Document_assignment is a mechanism to associate a document with an object, where the assigned document provides information about the object it is associated to.

explicit.name: assigned_document
explicit.description: The assigned_document specifies the Document, Document_version, Document_definition, or File that is used to provide information.

explicit.name: is_assigned_to
explicit.description: The is_assigned_to specifies the object that information is provided for.

explicit.name: role

description.p: A Partial_document_assignment is a type of Document_assignment. A Partial_document_assignment identifies a specific portion of the contents of a document. It assigns this portion to the product data for which it is relevant.

explicit.name: document_portion
explicit.description: The document_portion specifies the word or group of words that convey the subject or sub contents of the Document.
